actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the adjusted gross income limitation will apply to all taxpayers eligible for the credit for the elderly and increase the amount of such limitation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the limitation on adjusted gross income for purposes of the credit for the elderly.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the adjusted gross income limitation will apply to all taxpayers eligible for the credit for the elderly and increase the amount of such limitation.
